projects.title: Betsson Gaming Platform
projects.description: High-performance React/TypeScript gaming platform with real-time data integration. Built scalable frontend modules, optimized API performance, and implemented distributed tracing for production monitoring. Handled high-traffic periods with improved UI performance and latency optimization.

projects.title: Recipharm Manufacturing Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive manufacturing and logistics dashboard powered by REST, GraphQL, and WebSocket connections. Features real-time data visualization, scalable state management, and internal tools for production teams. Improved component architecture and reduced frontend bugs significantly.

projects.title: AFRY Industrial Monitoring System
projects.description: Internal tooling system for distributed backend integration with sensor and equipment data visualization. Refactored legacy codebases for better performance and maintainability. Integrated real-time dashboards with REST APIs and reduced technical debt across multiple applications.

projects.title: High-Performance IPTV Streaming Engine
projects.description: Custom media engine with asynchronous processing pipelines for IPTV streaming. Implemented lock-free queues, thread affinity, and render scheduling for optimal performance. Features adaptive buffering, multi-threaded network handling, and FFmpeg integration for codec support. Reduced playback interruptions significantly through optimized buffering algorithms.

projects.title: Real-Time Oscilloscope Application
projects.description: Professional oscilloscope software built with Qt/C++ for audio signal analysis. Features real-time waveform visualization, frequency analysis, signal filtering, and data export capabilities. Implemented efficient threading for continuous data acquisition and processing without UI blocking.

projects.title: Face Recognition System
projects.description: Real-time face recognition application with GPU-accelerated inference using Luxand SDK and OpenCV. Features multi-camera support, preprocessing pipelines, and high-accuracy recognition in varied lighting conditions. Includes face detection, recognition, and tracking capabilities with database integration.

projects.title: Intelligent Chatbot System
projects.description: Advanced chatbot powered by OpenAI API with custom integration for vijilan.com. Features natural language understanding, context management, multi-turn conversations, and integration with company knowledge base. Includes sentiment analysis and automated response generation with fallback mechanisms.
